DOC.criteria: ( ) Patients diagnose renal prostatic disease undergo elective laparoscopic renal surgical procedure laparoscopic prostatectomy ; ( ii ) ASA class IIII ( iii ) > 18 year age ; ( iv ) Ability give oral write informed consent . ( ) Known suspected neuromuscular disorder impair neuromuscular function ; ( ii ) Allergies muscle relaxant , anesthetic narcotic ; ( iii ) A ( family ) history malignant hyperthermia ; ( iv ) Women may pregnant currently breast feeding ; ( v ) Renal insufficiency , define serum creatinine x 2 normal , urine output < 0.5 ml/kg/h least 6 h.
